verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician בִּנְגִינֹ֗ת <S%H5058><s%> [Tbin-gi-Not, on Neginoth מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <S%H4905><s%> mas-Kil Maschil לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. [A Psalm] of David בְּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> be-Vo came הַ֭זִּיפִים <S%H2130><s%> Haz-zi-fim when the Ziphims וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru and said לְשָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> le-sha-'Ul; to Saul הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not דָ֝וִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, Doth not David מִסְתַּתֵּ֥ר <S%H5641><s%> mis-tat-Ter hide עִמָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Ma-nu. O אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him me O God בְּשִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> be-shim-Cha by thy name הוֹשִׁיעֵ֑נִי <S%H3467><s%> ho-shi-'E-ni; Save וּבִגְבוּרָתְךָ֥ <S%H1369><s%> u-vig-vu-ra-te-Cha me by thy strength תְדִינֵֽנִי׃ <S%H1777><s%> te-di-Ne-ni. and judge

אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him O God שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> she-Ma' Hear תְּפִלָּתִ֑י <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-la-Ti; my prayer הַ֝אֲזִ֗ינָה <S%H238><s%> ha-'a-Zi-nah, give ear לְאִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> le-'im-rei- to the words פִֽי׃ <S%H6310><s%> Fi. of my mouth

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki For זָרִ֨ים׀ <S%H2114><s%> za-Rim For strangers קָ֤מוּ <S%H6965><s%> Ka-mu are risen up עָלַ֗י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai, against וְֽ֭עָרִיצִים <S%H6184><s%> Ve-'a-ri-tzim against me and oppressors בִּקְשׁ֣וּ <S%H1245><s%> bik-Shu seek נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi; after my soul לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo have not שָׂ֨מוּ <S%H7760><s%> Sa-mu they have not set אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God לְנֶגְדָּ֣ם <S%H5048><s%> le-neg-Dam before סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. before them Selah

הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him Behold God עֹזֵ֣ר <S%H5826><s%> 'o-Zer [is] mine helper לִ֑י Li; אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai, the Lord בְּֽסֹמְכֵ֥י <S%H5564><s%> be-so-me-Chei [is] with them that uphold נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi. my soul

יָשֹׁוב ya-shov כיָשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shiv break קהָ֭רַע <S%H7451><s%> Ha-ra' evil לְשֹׁרְרָ֑י <S%H8324><s%> le-sho-re-Rai; unto mine enemies בַּ֝אֲמִתְּךָ֗ <S%H571><s%> ba-'a-mit-te-cha, in thy truth הַצְמִיתֵֽם׃ <S%H6789><s%> hatz-mi-Tem. cut them off

בִּנְדָבָ֥ה <S%H5071><s%> bin-da-Vah I will freely אֶזְבְּחָה־ <S%H2076><s%> 'ez-be-chah- sacrifice לָּ֑ךְ Lach; א֤וֹדֶה <S%H3034><s%> o-deh unto thee I will praise שִּׁמְךָ֖ <S%H8034><s%> shim-Cha thy name יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> Tov. for [it is] good

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki from מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all צָ֭רָה <S%H6869><s%> Tza-rah me out of all trouble הִצִּילָ֑נִי <S%H5337><s%> hitz-tzi-La-ni; For he hath delivered וּ֝בְאֹיְבַ֗י <S%H341><s%> u-ve-'o-ye-Vai, [his desire] upon mine enemies רָאֲתָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> ra-'a-Tah hath seen עֵינִֽי׃ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Ni. and mine eye
